data.name: pattern_activate_email
data.value:
h1.Activate your email for "${__VirtualRootPath}":"$InviteLink" portal.
Hello!
To start participating in the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"$InviteLink" portal life you need to activate your email address. This is done for security reasons.
$OrangeButton
This link is valid for 7 days only. Please complete your email activation within that period.

data.name: pattern_backup_created
data.value:
h1."${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal backup created
Dear $OwnerName,
A backup file containing data from your "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal has been created.
To learn more on the backup procedure please refer to our "Data backup":"${__HelpLink}/administration/docspace-settings.aspx#CreatingBackup_block" user guide.
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "${__SupportLink}":"${__SupportLink}"
$TrulyYours

data.name: pattern_backup_created_tg
data.value:
[${__VirtualRootPath}](${__VirtualRootPath}) portal backup created
Dear $OwnerName,
A backup file containing data from your [${__VirtualRootPath}](${__VirtualRootPath}) portal has been created.
To learn more on the backup procedure please refer to our [Data backup](${__HelpLink}/tipstricks/data-backup-restore.aspx) user guide.
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at [${__SupportLink}](${__SupportLink})
Best regards, ONLYOFFICE Support Team [www.onlyoffice.com](https://onlyoffice.com/)

data.name: pattern_change_email_v115
data.value:
Want to change the email on your ${LetterLogoText} account?
Click the button below and log in* to your cloud.
$OrangeButton
The link is valid for 7 days.
*If you are not signed in to ${LetterLogoText} in this browser, you’ll need to use your old email for confirmation. If you don’t remember it, contact your portal admin.
Don’t want to change your email? Just ignore this message.

data.name: pattern_change_tfa
data.value:
h1.Security notification
The configuration of the authenticator app that you use to enter the ${LetterLogoText} portal has been reset.
Please click the button below to go to the portal login page and configure the authenticator application:
$OrangeButton

data.name: pattern_confirm_owner_change
data.value:
h1.Change of "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal owner
Dear $OwnerName,
There has been a request to change the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal owner to $UserName.
Please follow the link below to confirm the operation:
$OrangeButton
*Note*: this link is valid for 7 days only. Please complete the portal owner change process within that period.

data.name: pattern_enterprise_guest_activation_v10
data.value: h1. Join ONLYOFFICE DocSpace Hello, $UserName! You are invited to join "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" as a guest user. Accept the invitation by clicking the link: $OrangeButton The link is only valid for 7 days. You will get more tips on how to use your web-office. You can cancel the subscriptions on your Profile page at any moment as well as re-enable them.

data.name: pattern_enterprise_guest_welcome_v1
data.value:
to ONLYOFFICE DocSpace! Hello, $UserName! Welcome to ONLYOFFICE DocSpace! Your user profile has been successfully added to ${__VirtualRootPath}. Now you can:
Work with other users in the room you are invited to: view-only, review, collaboration, custom rooms.
Work with files of different formats: text documents, spreadsheets, presentations, digital forms, PDFs, e-books, multimedia.
Collaborate on documents with two co-editing modes: real-time or paragraph-locking. Track changes, communicate in real-time using the built-in chat or making audio and video calls.
Make use of the AI helper plugin: summarize and translate texts, generate images and keywords, analyze words, etc.
$OrangeButton If you need help, browse our Help Center or ask our support team. $TrulyYours

data.name: pattern_join
data.value:
h1.Invitation to join "${__VirtualRootPath}":"$InviteLink" portal
Hello,
You have requested to join the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"$InviteLink" portal at ${LetterLogoText} - a platform for document and project management. Join the portal and start collaborating with your colleagues or friends right away.
To accept the invitation please enter your name and password following this link:
$OrangeButton
*Note*: this link is valid for 48 hours only. Please complete the operation within that period.

data.name: pattern_mailbox_created
data.value: Dear $UserName, Administrator has created a new $Address mailbox for you at the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal. Use the following settings for other email clients: Login: $Login Password: "set password":"$MyStaffLink" Incoming Mail (IMAP): Server: $Server Port: $ImapPort SSL/TLS: $Encryption Outgoing Mail (SMTP): Server: $Server Port: $SmtpPort SSL/TLS: $Encryption Requires Authentication: Yes If you received this email by mistake, please ignore it or contact your portal administrator to find out the details.

data.name: pattern_mailbox_password_changed
data.value: Dear $UserName, The password for the $Address mailbox has been changed. If you received this email by mistake, please ignore it or contact your portal administrator to find out the details.

data.name: pattern_mailbox_without_settings_created
data.value: Dear $UserName, Administrator has created a new $Address mailbox for you at the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal. If you received this email by mistake, please ignore it or contact your portal administrator to find out the details.

data.name: pattern_migration_error
data.value:
h1.Another region portal migration error
An error has occurred while migrating to the $RegionName region. Please, try once again later. Your portal is now available at the old address "$PortalUrl":"$PortalUrl"
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "${__SalesEmail}":"mailto:${__SalesEmail}"
$TrulyYours
^To change the notification type, please manage your "subscription settings":"$RecipientSubscriptionConfigURL".^

data.name: pattern_migration_server_failure
data.value:
h1.Another region portal migration error
An error has occurred while migrating to another region. Please, try once again later. Your portal is now available at the old address "$PortalUrl":"$PortalUrl"
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "${__SalesEmail}":"mailto:${__SalesEmail}"
$TrulyYours
^To change the notification type, please manage your "subscription settings":"$RecipientSubscriptionConfigURL".^

data.name: pattern_migration_start
data.value:
h1.Another region portal migration started
The portal migration to the $RegionName region is started. It might take some time depending on your data amount.
*Note*: the portal will not be available during the migration process. After the migration is complete the portal URL will be changed and all the shared documents links will be inaccessible.
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "${__SalesEmail}":"mailto:${__SalesEmail}"
$TrulyYours

data.name: pattern_migration_success_v115
data.value:
h1.Portal migration h1."$PortalUrl":"$PortalUrl"
Your portal has been migrated to a new domain. Please restore your access to the portal by specifying the password which will be used for signing in.
Please follow the link below to set your password for the account:
$OrangeButton
*Note*: this link is valid for 7 days only. Please complete the access restore process within that period.
If you received this email by mistake, please ignore it or contact your "$PortalUrl":"$PortalUrl" portal administrator to find out the details.

data.name: pattern_portal_deactivate
data.value:
h1.Deactivation of the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal
Dear $OwnerName,
You have requested a temporary deactivation of your "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal. Please follow the link below to confirm the operation:
$OrangeButton
*Note*: this link is valid for 7 days only. Please complete the portal deactivation process within that period.
You can reactivate your portal any time by clicking the following link: p=. "Reactivate Portal":"$ActivateUrl" (this link has no time limit)
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "${__SalesEmail}":"mailto:${__SalesEmail}"
$TrulyYours

data.name: pattern_portal_deactivate_tg
data.value:
Deactivation of the [${__VirtualRootPath}](${__VirtualRootPath}) portal
Dear $OwnerName,
You have requested a temporary deactivation of your [${__VirtualRootPath}](${__VirtualRootPath}) portal. Please follow the link below to confirm the operation:
$OrangeButton
_Note_: this link is valid for 7 days only. Please complete the portal deactivation process within that period.
You can reactivate your portal any time by clicking the following link: [Reactivate Portal]($ActivateUrl) (this link has no time limit)
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at [${__SalesEmail}](mailto:${__SalesEmail})
Best regards, ONLYOFFICE Support Team [www.onlyoffice.com](https://onlyoffice.com/)

data.name: pattern_portal_delete
data.value:
h1.Deletion of the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" space
Dear $OwnerName,
You have requested to permanently delete your "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" space.
*Important! All the data stored in your space, as well as your registration details will be lost and cannot be recovered.*
#if($AutoRenew == "True") Before you delete the space, please make sure that automatic billing is turned off. You may check the status of automatic billing in your "Avangate account":"https://secure.avangate.com/myaccount/". #end
If you still want to delete your "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" space please follow the link below to confirm the operation:
$OrangeButton
*Note*: this link is valid for 7 days only. Please complete the portal deletion process within that period.
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "${__SalesEmail}":"mailto:${__SalesEmail}"
$TrulyYours

data.name: pattern_portal_delete_tg
data.value:
Deletion of the [${__VirtualRootPath}](${__VirtualRootPath}) portal
Dear $OwnerName,
You have requested to permanently delete your [${__VirtualRootPath}](${__VirtualRootPath}) portal.
_Important! All the data stored on your portal, as well as your registration details will be lost and cannot be recovered._
#if($AutoRenew == "True") Before you delete the portal, please make sure that automatic billing is turned off. You may check the status of automatic billing in your [Avangate account](https://secure.avangate.com/myaccount/"). #end
If you still want to delete your [${__VirtualRootPath}](${__VirtualRootPath}) portal please follow the link below to confirm the operation:
$OrangeButton
_Note_: this link is valid for 7 days only. Please complete the portal deletion process within that period.
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at [${__SalesEmail}](mailto:${__SalesEmail})
Best regards, ONLYOFFICE Support Team [www.onlyoffice.com](https://onlyoffice.com/)

data.name: pattern_profile_delete
data.value:
h1.Disabling account on "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}"
You have requested to disable your account in DocSpace "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}".
If you still want to disable your account, please follow the link below to confirm the operation:

data.name: pattern_profile_has_deleted_itself
data.value:
User "$FromUserName":"$FromUserLink" has deleted his/her profile, and this profile is now blocked. All user’s files are still assigned to him/her and occupy disk space.
You can reassign the user’s documents shared with others to another active user or remove them to free up the portal disk space.
Please go to the user profile using "this link":"$FromUserLink" to reassign documents to another user or remove the data.

data.name: pattern_storage_decryption_error
data.value:
Hello, $UserName!
The file decryption process on your portal "${PortalUrl}":"${PortalUrl}" has been failed.
Some files could not be decrypted. Find more details in the "Control Panel":"${ControlPanelUrl}/storage".

data.name: pattern_storage_decryption_start
data.value:
Hello, $UserName!
The file decryption process has been started on your portal "${PortalUrl}":"${PortalUrl}".
The decryption might take some time, so the portal will be temporarily unavailable. As soon as the decryption is over, you will be able to work with your data again.

data.name: pattern_storage_decryption_success
data.value:
Hello, $UserName!
The file decryption process on your portal "${PortalUrl}":"${PortalUrl}" has been successfully completed.
Your portal is available again.

data.name: pattern_storage_encryption_error
data.value:
Hello, $UserName!
The file encryption process on the "${PortalUrl}":"${PortalUrl}" portal has been failed.
Some files could not be encrypted. Find more details in the "Control Panel":"${ControlPanelUrl}/storage".

data.name: pattern_storage_encryption_start
data.value:

The file encryption process has been started on your portal "${PortalUrl}":"${PortalUrl}".
The encryption might take some time, so the portal will be temporarily unavailable. As soon as the encryption is over, you will be able to work with your data again.

data.name: pattern_enterprise_admin_welcome_v1
data.value:
Discover business subscription of ONLYOFFICE DocSpace Hello, $UserName! Here are three simple questions for you which can help us make your user experience even more comfortable.
Do you have a big team or lots of customers and partners to collaborate with in your ONLYOFFICE DocSpace?
Would you like to create any number of rooms to work with numerous documents?
Do you want to use ONLYOFFICE DocSpace under your own brand?
Please consult the payments section of your ONLYOFFICE DocSpace. There, you will find an individual link to the Stripe Customer Portal where you can easily handle all the payment details. $OrangeButton
Please note: The person who pays the subscription becomes the payer. Only the payer is able to make changes to the subscription (adjust the number of managers). Users don’t have access to the payments details. The owner of the ONLYOFFICE DocSpace account is able to reassign the payer anytime later.
$TrulyYours

data.name: pattern_enterprise_admin_user_docs_tips_v1
data.value:
5 tips for effective work on your docs Hello, $UserName! We hope you enjoy using your ONLYOFFICE DocSpace. Here are some tips on how to make work on documents more effective.
#1. Choose the way you work.
Organize your workflow as you need it by creating collaboration rooms for real-time co-authoring or custom rooms with flexible settings for any purpose.
Learn more
#2. Work with any content you have. Store and work with files of different formats within your rooms: text documents, spreadsheets, presentations, digital forms, PDFs, e-books, multimedia.
#3. Co-author effectively.
Collaborate on documents with two co-editing modes: real-time or paragraph-locking. Track changes, communicate in real-time using the built-in chat or making audio and video calls.
Learn more
#4. Collaborate securely.
Fine-tune the access to the whole space or separate rooms with flexible permissions and user roles.
#5. Make use of the AI helper plugin.
Summarize and translate texts, generate images and keywords, analyze words, etc. Learn more
$OrangeButton
Please note: The person who pays the subscription becomes the payer. Only the payer is able to make changes to the subscription (adjust the number of managers). Users don’t have access to the payments details. The owner of the ONLYOFFICE DocSpace account is able to reassign the payer anytime later.
data.comment:
5 tips for effective work on your docs

We hope you enjoy using your ONLYOFFICE DocSpace. Here are some tips on how to make work on documents more effective.

#2. Work with any content you have. Store and work with files of different formats within your rooms: text documents, spreadsheets, presentations, digital forms, PDFs, e-books, multimedia.
#3. Co-author effectively. Collaborate on documents with two co-editing modes: real-time or paragraph-locking. Track changes, communicate in real-time using the built-in chat or making audio and video calls. Learn more
#4. Collaborate securely. Fine-tune the access to the whole space or separate rooms with flexible permissions and user roles.
#5. Make use of the AI helper plugin. Summarize and translate texts, generate images and keywords, analyze words, etc. Learn more
$OrangeButton
$TrulyYours

data.name: pattern_enterprise_user_welcome_v1
data.value:
to ONLYOFFICE DocSpace! Hello, $UserName! Welcome to ONLYOFFICE DocSpace! Your user profile has been successfully added to ${__VirtualRootPath}. Now you can:
Work with other users in the room you are invited to: view-only, review, collaboration, custom rooms.
Work with files of different formats: text documents, spreadsheets, presentations, digital forms, PDFs, e-books, multimedia.
Collaborate on documents with two co-editing modes: real-time or paragraph-locking. Track changes, communicate in real-time using the built-in chat or making audio and video calls.
Make use of the AI helper plugin: summarize and translate texts, generate images and keywords, analyze words, etc.
$OrangeButton If you need help, browse our Help Center or ask our support team. $TrulyYours

$OrangeButton

$TrulyYours

(Welcome) to ONLYOFFICE DocSpace!
Hello, $UserName!
Welcome to ONLYOFFICE DocSpace! Your user profile has been successfully added to ${__VirtualRootPath}. Now you can:
Work with other users in the room you are invited to: view-only, review, collaboration, custom rooms.
Work with files of different formats: text documents, spreadsheets, presentations, digital forms, PDFs, e-books, multimedia.
Collaborate on documents with two co-editing modes: real-time or paragraph-locking. Track changes, communicate in real-time using the built-in chat or making audio and video calls.
Make use of the AI helper plugin: summarize and translate texts, generate images and keywords, analyze words, etc.
$OrangeButton
If you need help, browse our Help Center or ask our support team.
$TrulyYours

data.name: pattern_saas_admin_integrations_v3
data.value:
ONLYOFFICE DocSpace: Explore useful integrations Hello! We collected the ready-to-use DocSpace integrations in this newsletter for you. Try now and enhance your productivity!
ONLYOFFICE DocSpace & ZoomCollaborate on any content during Zoom Meetings with other participants. Efficiently manage your documents between meetings.Learn more$OrangeButton1
ONLYOFFICE DocSpace & ZapierAutomate your workflow using zaps for DocSpace and various apps like Asana, Slack, HubSpot, Discord, Linear, etc.Learn more$OrangeButton2
ONLYOFFICE DocSpace & WordpressEmbed docs and rooms into your website allowing visitors to view files without downloading. Manage office docs via DocSpace.Learn more$OrangeButton3
ONLYOFFICE DocSpace & DrupalMake office documents easily accessible to your website visitors and manage files via DocSpace.Learn more$OrangeButton4
ONLYOFFICE DocSpace & PipedriveWork with office files related to your Pipedrive Deals in DocSpace rooms.$OrangeButton5 $TrulyYours

data.name: pattern_saas_admin_modules_v3
data.value:
Configure your ONLYOFFICE DocSpace Hello, $UserName! Adjust settings of your ONLYOFFICE DocSpace to make it more secure and comfortable to use:
Set password strength
Enable two-factor authentication and Single Sign-On
Determine trusted mail domains and session lifetime
Restrict access from specific IP addresses
Allow or restrict admin messages
Import users and groups from LDAP server
Customize logos and select the color scheme
Set storage quota for users and rooms
Enable automatic data backup
$OrangeButton Please note: some of the settings are available in the DocSpace Business plan only. Visit our Help Center to learn more about configuring and managing your ONLYOFFICE DocSpace. You are also welcome to consult it when you have questions about the functionality. $TrulyYours

data.name: pattern_saas_admin_user_docs_tips_v3
data.value:
5 tips for effective work on your docs Hello, $UserName! We hope you enjoy using your ONLYOFFICE DocSpace. Here are some tips on how to make work on documents more effective.
#1. Choose the way you work.
Organize your workflow as you need: enjoy stress-free co-editing in collaboration rooms, simplify file sharing with external users in public rooms, work together according to your goals in custom rooms, collect and analyze responses in form filling rooms, use Virtual Data rooms for advanced file security.
#2. Work with any content you have. Store and work with files of different formats within your rooms: text documents, spreadsheets, presentations, digital forms, PDFs, e-books, multimedia, Markdown.
#3. Co-author effectively.
Collaborate on documents with two co-editing modes: real-time or paragraph-locking. Track changes, communicate in real-time using the built-in chat or making audio and video calls.
Learn more
#4. Collaborate securely.
Fine-tune the access to the whole space or separate rooms with flexible permissions and user roles.
#5. Make use of the AI helper plugin.
Summarize and translate texts, generate images and keywords, analyze words, etc. Learn more
$OrangeButton $TrulyYours
data.comment:

data.name: pattern_saas_admin_welcome_v3
data.value:
Hello, $UserName! Here are three simple questions for you which can help us make your user experience even more comfortable.
Do you have a big team or lots of customers and partners to collaborate with in your ONLYOFFICE DocSpace?
Would you like to create any number of rooms to work with numerous documents?
Do you want to use ONLYOFFICE DocSpace under your own brand?
If you have at least one ‘yes’ answer, opt for the BUSINESS tariff plan which allows you to add any desired number of admins to your ONLYOFFICE DocSpace as well as apply branding options. To do so, please consult the Payments section of your ONLYOFFICE DocSpace. There, you will find an individual link to the Stripe Customer Portal where you can easily handle all the payment details. $OrangeButton
Please note: The person who pays the subscription becomes the payer. Only the payer is able to make changes to the subscription (adjust the number of admins). Users don’t have access to the payments details. The owner of the ONLYOFFICE DocSpace account is able to reassign the payer anytime later.
$TrulyYours

data.name: pattern_saas_user_welcome_v3
data.value:
to ONLYOFFICE DocSpace! Hello, $UserName! Welcome to ONLYOFFICE DocSpace! Your user profile has been successfully added to ${__VirtualRootPath}. Now you can:
Work with other users in various rooms: collaboration rooms for stress-free co-authoring, public rooms for external file sharing, form filling rooms, custom rooms and Virtual Data rooms.
Work with files of different formats: text documents, spreadsheets, presentations, digital forms, PDFs, e-books, multimedia, Markdown.
Collaborate on documents with two co-editing modes: real-time or paragraph-locking. Track changes, communicate in real-time using the built-in chat or making audio and video calls.
Make use of the AI helper plugin: summarize and translate texts, generate images and keywords, analyze words, etc.
$OrangeButton If you need help, browse our Help Center or ask our support team. $TrulyYours
data.comment:
(Welcome) to ONLYOFFICE DocSpace!
Hello, $UserName!
Welcome to ONLYOFFICE DocSpace! Your user profile has been successfully added to "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}". Now you can:
Work with other users in various rooms: collaboration rooms for stress-free co-authoring, public rooms for external file sharing, form filling rooms, custom rooms and Virtual Data rooms.
Work with files of different formats: text documents, spreadsheets, presentations, digital forms, PDFs, e-books, multimedia, Markdown.
Collaborate on documents with two co-editing modes: real-time or paragraph-locking. Track changes, communicate in real-time using the built-in chat or making audio and video calls.
Make use of the AI helper plugin: summarize and translate texts, generate images and keywords, analyze words, etc.
$OrangeButton
If you need help, browse our "Help Center":"${__HelpLink}" or ask our "support team":"${__SupportLink}".
$TrulyYours

data.name: pattern_saas_admin_startup_warning_after_year_v1
data.value:
Your ONLYOFFICE DocSpace will be deleted Your ONLYOFFICE DocSpace ${__VirtualRootPath} has been inactive for more than a year. Since you have decided not to use it anymore, your ONLYOFFICE DocSpace and all the data will be deleted in accordance with our Privacy Policy.
We would appreciate your feedback. Why have you decided to stop using ONLYOFFICE DocSpace?
$OrangeButton
If you want to continue using your ONLYOFFICE DocSpace, just enter it and make any action. $TrulyYours
